description:
TOURS & ATTRACTIONS
ABOARD THE QUEEN MARY

GENERAL ATTRACTION HOURS FOR SATURDAY, AUGUST 5TH WILL BE 11AM – 6PM

 

Glory Days Tour: 11:15, 1:15, 3:15

Haunted Encounters: 12:30, 2:30, 4:30

Tour Center: 9am – 4:30pm

Diana: 11am – 6pm (Last entry will be 5pm)

Titanic: 11am – 6pm (Last entry will be 5:30pm)

Get an up close and personal look at the Queen Mary with one of our exciting and informative guided tours. From the ship's groundbreaking construction and royal launch as the most luxurious and technologically advanced ocean liner at the time, to her duty as a troopship during WWII, to her golden days of the 1950s, to her earning the nickname, the "haunted ship," the Queen Mary's history is full of action, adventure, romance and paranormal activity. Explore the ship from bow to stern, inside and out, and hear unique stories, facts and insights about the Queen Mary from our expert guides. Groups of 15 or more may call 562-499-1718 for discounted group rates.

Please note: Due to the historic nature of the ship, some areas as well as several of the tours require the use of stairs and are therefore not wheelchair accessible. The Princess Diana Exhibit is fully accessible.

Temporarily Unavailable: Audio Tour - Tour (1.5-2 hours) the Queen Mary at your own pace with our comprehensive Audio Tour. Learn the history of the Queen Mary while strolling the decks with our exclusive Queen Mary headset.

deliveryMethods.deliveryMethodDescription: Your tickets will be attached as a PDF in the confirmation email.  Please print and bring this with you to the event.  You can also present the ticket barcode image(s) on an un-cracked smartphone display, with the brightness turned all the way up.  Make sure you have it ready before you approach the entrance to the event.
